thread.title: Wall crumbles onto pedestrians as bus crashes into parking area
thread.title_full: Wall crumbles onto pedestrians as bus crashes into parking area | News24

author: news24.com
title: Wall crumbles onto pedestrians as bus crashes into parking area
text:
Bloemfontein - A bus crashed into the wall of a parking lot on the third storey of a building on Monday, injuring two passers-by on the ground below who were hit by falling glass and debris.
- Were you there? Send us your eyewitness accounts and photos .
ER24 spokesperson Werner Vermaak said the accident happened in Central Park, Bloemfontein at around 06:00 on Monday.
"It is understood that a bus crashed into the parking lotâ€™s wall which is situated approximately three storeys high in Central Park, Bloemfontein.
